channel.title: Still cannot find server
channel.description: Hi there. This has worked before, btw. I'm trying to run my own server, but the listing site still can't find it. I'm trying to run the Hybridscape that came with moparscape, BTW. I typed in my no-ip address into the title bar, and it brought me to my router config, so I know that the address is working. So why can't it find the game?

item.title: Still cannot find server
item.dc:creator: @tgp1994 tgp1994
item.description:
@tgp1994 wrote:

Wait a second… I’m confused now. Does it matter weather I use 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0? Also, I’m not sure that dictates weather people can connect to me or not, does it?

Read full topic

item.title: Still cannot find server
item.dc:creator: @_mnchmn2 ~mnchmn2~
item.description:
@_mnchmn2 wrote:

dude hybrid scape is moparscape really… and you dont have to be logged in
also when you click run you dont hack to put the no-ip addres in the ip bar… you can just use 127.0.0.1
itll log u in your server

Read full topic

item.title: Still cannot find server
item.dc:creator: @tgp1994 tgp1994
item.description:
@tgp1994 wrote:

Wait, I still want to use Hybridscape, I have to be logged in to have it running? I thought just clicking run server would get it to work. And can i still host with it?

Read full topic

item.title: Still cannot find server
item.dc:creator: @Coder_X Coder X
item.description:
@Coder_X wrote:

Hehe…Hybridscape is a part of the moparscape client. You can simply just load up the client, and choose any username and password to login. Closed source as far as i know.

If you wish to host a server then you’ll need to download your own source, from the download section of these forums. Once downloaded, extract the file, go into folder, click runserver. Then login using moparscape client, or the appropriate client for the source.

Pm for details.

Read full topic

item.title: Still cannot find server
item.dc:creator: @mortaltiger mortaltiger
item.description:
@mortaltiger wrote:

download like a cilent like pimpscape or testscape then use your comple to see if everything is good… then the the file that you choose (pimpscape or testscape) and use run server to get on. its easy… but getting ppl to come to server is hard for me.

Read full topic
